text: I've often been asked like what what is
it that you know I think back over my
career what makes this opportunity
unique here at Amazon or what are the
things about working with customers that
excite me and one of the interesting
things is we hire people that know the
industry we bring people into our team
that have worked in retail have worked
in food service and restaurants and have
worked in consumer goods so what I like
to say is all of those people they
prepared their whole career for the next
meeting what's so amazing and unique
about that is they bring the industry
Knowledge and Skills they bring this
knowledge of technology that right that
sets us apart when you match those
things together we sit down with the
customer we're we're able to relate to
them we're able to understand their
needs to work backwards from like a use
case or an experience they're looking to
develop and deploy and we go beyond the
technology and go beyond the process and
go behind any sort of transaction it's
about a relationship but is founded in
the fact that we understand the industry
